body: Hey, this is Broskies_Spence. I made a new minecraft account because im tired of using my brothers old one. I want to know if I can transfer my gold and credits to this account. (I have my receipt for the Gold Rank purchase).
body_tagged: Hey, this is Broskies_Spence. I made a new minecraft account because im tired of using my brothers old one. I want to know if I can transfer my gold and credits to this account. (I have my receipt for the Gold Rank purchase).
title: Help needed

replies.body: You can transfer ranks, yes, but you will need to provide your receipt and/or other evidence to a senior staff member. As for the credits, I don't think you can transfer them (other people correct me if I am wrong on this part, I can't remember if you can or not)
replies.body_tagged: You can transfer ranks, yes, but you will need to provide your receipt and/or other evidence to a senior staff member. As for the credits, I don't think you can transfer them (other people correct me if I am wrong on this part, I can't remember if you can or not)

replies.body: Well I know that admins can give credits so maybe if you ask them to, they can whip up the credits to your new account.
replies.body_tagged: Well I know that admins can give credits so maybe if you ask them to, they can whip up the credits to your new account.

replies.body: Yeah, so, refering to what Emma said, if you want to contact a senior staff, the most suitable solution would be hoping on our TS (ts.avicus.net) and if there's someone on, don't be afraid to ask him.
